content.title: Mukhyamantri Kalakar Sahayata Yojana
content.details: The scheme 'Mukhyamantri Kalakar Sahayata Yojana' was launched by the Odia Language, Literature & Culture Department, Government of Odisha to provide subsistence and support to the aged artists who despite their poverty have persistently dedicated themselves to enriching, displaying, and preserving the arts and culture of Odisha. Under the scheme, the State Government is providing pensions to indigent artists who are in distress condition despite his/her lifelong commitment/dedication to our art and culture with their noteworthy contributions.
benefits: The financial assistance for an artist shall be ₹1200/- per month.
eligibility: An artist in order to be eligible for the assistance shall be of a minimum of 50 years of age in the case of males and 40 years and above in the case of female artists.

The annual income of the artist shall not exceed ₹50,000/- only for the artists belonging to the Rural Area and ₹60,000/- only for the artists belonging to the Urban Area or as may further be determined by the Government from time to time.
An artist covered under this scheme will not be eligible for similar benefits under any other scheme of the Government.
exclusions: On the satisfaction of the Government that information furnished to the District Level Selection Committee in pursuance was either erroneous, false or inconclusive
On the determination by the Government that the beneficiary has indulged in activities prejudicial to the public interest or public order
On his/her ceasing to have the eligibility
Non-submission of Life Certificate within the prescribed date line during each year.
content.application_process: Online. To avail of the benefits under the scheme, the applicant need to visit the official login website: http://www.mksy.in/. The applicants need to register, in case not registered, click on 'Apply for Registration' and fill in all the mandatory details.
documents_required: Identity proof i.e. Copy of Aadhaar Card, Voter ID
Income certificate (Issued by a Competent Authority)

faqs.question: What is the 'Mukhyamantri Kalakar Sahayata Yojana (MKSY)'?
faqs.answer: Mukhyamantri Kalakar Sahayata Yojana is a scheme initiated by the Odisha State Government to provide financial assistance and support to aged artists who have dedicated themselves to enriching and preserving the arts and culture of Odisha.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: An artist of Odisha state can apply under the scheme.

faqs.question: What are the age criteria to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: An artist in order to be eligible for the assistance shall be of a minimum of 50 years of age in the case of males and 40 years and above in the case of female artists.

faqs.question: Is there any income criteria for the applicant?
faqs.answer: Yes, the annual income of the artist shall not exceed ₹50,000/- only for the artists belonging to the Rural Area and ₹60,000/- only for the artists belonging to the Urban Area or as may further be determined by the Government from time to time.

faqs.question: Can an artist also avail of the benefits of other schemes?
faqs.answer: No, an artist covered under this scheme will not be eligible for similar benefits under any other scheme of the Government.

faqs.question: What is the maximum financial assistance provided under the 'MKSY' Scheme?
faqs.answer: The financial assistance for an artist is ₹1200/- per month.

faqs.question: What are the conditions for cancellation of Pension?
faqs.answer: The pension can be cancelled on his/her death, on the satisfaction of the Government that information furnished was erroneous, false or inconclusive, on the determination that the beneficiary has indulged in activities prejudicial to public interest, on ceasing to have eligibility, or non-submission of Life Certificate within the prescribed date line.

faqs.question: How to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The eligible applicant may visit the official website http://www.mksy.in/
